verbs.description: [ARG1: MSNBC Contributor and former McCain campaign manager Steve Schmidt] [V: was] [ARG2: so furious about White House staffer Kelly Sadler 's " joke " at Senator John McCain 's expense his voice shook while he railed against Trump and his White House] .
